name: Aaron Michael Services

service.name: Foundation Repair
service.description: Comprehensive foundation repair including crack injection, wall anchors, helical piers, and slab lifting.

service.name: Pier & Beam Foundation Repair
service.description: Leveling, pier replacement, joist sistering, and crawlspace stabilization for pier & beam homes.

service.name: Basement Waterproofing
service.description: Interior and exterior drainage systems, sump pumps, and vapor barrier installation to prevent water intrusion.

service.name: Slab Lifting
service.description: Polyjacking, mudjacking, and void fill to restore level slabs and eliminate settling hazards.

service.name: Structural Inspection
service.description: Detailed structural inspections, documentation, and repair plans for homeowners, realtors, and insurance claims.

description: Aaron Michael Services provides expert foundation repair across Buffalo, Amherst, Tonawanda, Kenmore and Western New York. Call 716-533-7108 for inspections and repair plans.
